aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subTitle: Your Startup’s Partner for Talent, Growth, and Success
aboutUs.paragraph: At Yllaaa, we believe in empowering startups to succeed by connecting them with the right talent and resources. Our platform goes beyond traditional freelancing by offering dedicated support through experienced account managers, a seamless matching process, and a focus on collaboration. We’re here to help you build and grow with confidence, every step of the way.

earth.title: Want to work beyond borders?
earth.description: YLLAAA gives you the chance to work globally, collaborate with international startups, and earn in hard currency. Gain amazing experience creating top-tier MVPs. Grow your skills,widen your network and unleash new possibilities of your career within global market

about.title: About us
about.description: At YLLAAA, we connect startups with the top 1% of talent in Egypt. We believe in helping startups succeed by finding them the right talent and resources. Unlike traditional freelancing, our platform goes beyond just offering the matching process; we have dedicated support through experienced account managers, seamless matching process and focused collaboration!

cloudHero.title: From the Land of the Pyramids to the World!
cloudHero.description: Visionaries who once built the pyramids are now revolutionizing startups worldwide! The top1% of Egyptian talent is now shaping the future with modern ideas, global impact, and world-class MVPs.

cost.title: Cut Costs?
cost.header: What if outsourcing talent could be
cost.description: At YLLAAA, we connect you to the top 1% of Egypt’s freelance talent, providing you with world-class MVP development at a fraction of the cost. We handle everything so you can focus on growing your business without the stress!

proccess.description: Yalla embraces a dynamic and flexible process, prioritizing collaboration and tailored solutions for every client.
proccess.paragraph1: Choose an account manager who speaks your language and understands your business culture.
proccess.paragraph2: Grab a virtual or real coffe with your account manager, we listen, we strategize, and we craft a plan that ressonate with your vision
proccess.paragraph3: Ditch the guesswork. Our AI-powered tool presents a tailored, transparent plan with recommended budgets and timelines.
proccess.paragraph4: Our advanced algorithm pairs you with a World-Class team of Egyptian talents, ensuring your venture reaches new heights.

clients.description: Building an MVP efficiently is the best way to accelerate Your Idea to Reality. Our app is designed to be the most affordable, rapid, and top-quality solution for MVP development in the market.

aboutHero.description: At Yllaaa, we connect freelancers and businesses, supported by project managers, to foster collaboration, flexibility, and growth. Our platform creates an ecosystem where talent and opportunity meet, empowering both to thrive.

business.paragraph: Start working with the best software, design and marketing freelancers. Save on fixed costs and make your growth more flexible.

freelancer.paragraph: Find projects that match your talent. We are the first freeworker community that puts talent first.
